desc: Huge boost to BC & HC drop rate when HP is below 50%

dictionary.lore: A necklace said to be possessed by the people of the great forest in which a protective spirit dwells. This mysterious necklace uses the power of a protective entity to increase the fighting spirit and vitality of the wearer. Some stories tell of a particular warrior that wore this necklace who was very successful in battle during the last stages of the war with the gods. However, it is said that the protective spirit that lived within it disappeared after some time.

name: Zombie Jabot
